description:
Keysafe reads and decrypts Apple Keychain files. Use Keysafe to securely access your passwords and credentials without a Mac. Keysafe can look up individual passwords or export an entire Keychain.

A [licence](https://store.miln.eu/) is required to fully decrypt a record. Without a licence, only the first few characters of the decrypted value will be displayed. For short values, no characters will be shown.
author: Miln
